attributes.action: Make eating and  torturing dogs illegal in every country
attributes.background: Thousands of dogs in China are being killed and  tortured for their meat. The videos shown on social media are graphic and include images of people skinning and boiling them alive, beating them with knives and bats. This must stop.

rejection.details:
The UK Parliament is only responsible for making the law in the UK, not in the rest of the world. 

You might like to sign this petition instead:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/253799

Alternatively, you could start a new petition asking the UK Government to urge the government of China to take action to prevent the torture and killing of dogs for meat.
